bibl.title: The Debate on Undetected Crime and an Undetected Fragment from Euripides' Sisyphus.
bibl.note: Combines two iambic trimeters preserved in the Life of Euripides by Satyrus, P. Oxy. IX, 1176, fr. 39, ii, 8-4 (= Pack2 1456) = Eur. fr. 1007c Nauck-Snell, with the atheistic fragment Tr.G.F. 1.43 F 19. - Pp. 45-46: Brief Reply to M. Winiarczyk [Nochmals das Satyrspiel Sisyphos, WS 100 (1987) pp. 35-45].
Yunis Harvey, The Debate on Undetected Crime and an Undetected Fragment from Euripides' Sisyphus.
